mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Users (Username, Email, Password, ShippingAddress, ShippingPostalCode) VALUES (#{username}, #{email}, #{password}, #{shippingAddress}, #{shippingPostalCode})
mapper.select: SELECT m.UserID, m.Username, m.Email, m.Password, m.ShippingAddress, m.ShippingPostalCode, a.auth FROM Users m LEFT JOIN tbl_member_auth a ON m.UserID = a.UserID WHERE m.UserID = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM Users WHERE Username = #{username} AND Password = #{password}
